name: Sidewalk Sidestep
description:
"Hey, I'm walkin' here!!" 🚶‍♂️🚶‍♂️🚶‍♂️

A browser game about awkward sidewalk interactions in the big city.

Tap the corresponding arrow key when your bar's full to get past each impending pedestrian!  ⬅️➡️

Commissioned by the super rad folks at [adult swim] in late 2017.

Super catchy 8-Bit Bossa Nova by the super talented Joth (CC0).
